titles: A letter from his Maty. King Charls IId. To his peers the Lords in England. Directed to our right trusty and right well-beloved cosens the peerage of our Kingdom of England.
author: Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
notes: "An exhortation to bring the people of England to their former obedience." -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
